      List<AutonomousCar> autonomousCarStates(AutonomousCar vehiculeEnDeplacement)

      Generates a list of Autonomous Cars using those methods: AutonomousCarServicegetNombreDeVehicules4HWC() AutonomousCarServicegetXYCoinDroit4HWC() AutonomousCarServicegetXYInitiale4HWC(int) AutonomousCarServicegetOrientationInitiale4HWC() AutonomousCarServicegetInstructions4HWC()

      Using Random class to generate a number from 0 to 5 representing AutonomousCar.getXCoinDroit() and AutonomousCar.getYCoinDroit()
      int getXYInitiale4HWC(int xy)
      Using Random class to generate a number from 1 to getXYCoinDroit4HWC() representing AutonomousCar.getXInitiale() and AutonomousCar.getYInitiale()

      • validationNombreDeVehicules

        public void validationNombreDeVehicules(String nbre)
                                 throws AutonomousCarException
        Verifies if the number of cars is correct
        Parameters:
        nbre -
        Throws:
        AutonomousCarException - if nbre is not a number or if nbre is inferior than 1

      • getXYCoinDroit4HWC

        public int getXYCoinDroit4HWC()
        Using Random class to generate a number from 0 to 5 representing AutonomousCar.getXCoinDroit() and AutonomousCar.getYCoinDroit()
        Returns:
        Returns a number from 0 to 5

      • getXYInitiale4HWC

        public int getXYInitiale4HWC(int xy)
        Using Random class to generate a number from 1 to getXYCoinDroit4HWC() representing AutonomousCar.getXInitiale() and AutonomousCar.getYInitiale()
        Parameters:
        xy - representing getXYCoinDroit4HWC()
        Returns:
        Returns a number from 0 to 5

      • getVehicules4HWC

        public List<AutonomousCar> getVehicules4HWC()

        Generates a list of Autonomous Cars using those methods:

        • AutonomousCarServicegetNombreDeVehicules4HWC()
        • AutonomousCarServicegetXYCoinDroit4HWC()
        • AutonomousCarServicegetXYInitiale4HWC(int)
        • AutonomousCarServicegetOrientationInitiale4HWC()
        • AutonomousCarServicegetInstructions4HWC()

        Returns:
        Returns List generated randomly

      • autonomousCarStates

        public List<AutonomousCar> autonomousCarStates(AutonomousCar vehiculeEnDeplacement)
        Parameters:
        vehiculeEnDeplacement - Generate a list of Autonomous Cars representing the states of vehiculeEnDeplacement. Each AutonomousCar present in the list represents a state of the main car vehiculeEnDeplacement. The states of vehiculeEnDeplacement are recorded.
        Returns:
        List
